answers.answer: Hi,Have you had previous bouts of headaches before?Have you previously experienced the same symptoms of poor concentration and memory loss?Are you taking any medications?Do you have any other underlying systemic disease like diabetes?Any hormonal problems or change in urinary patterns?I will appreciate it if you can provide us with answers.

question: I am a 32 yr old female and a couple of weeks ago the back of my head was a bit sore for several days but I hadn't hit it or anything.  It finally went away but I started having a headache not a bad headache (just kind of annoying) frequently.  I have some intermittent pain that goes across my forehead.  But I seem to forget simple things, for instance I was showering and I couldn't remember if I had washed my hair or not or I packed a bag of clothes for my daughter and I couldn't remember what I put in the bag to match socks to it.  It seems like I lose my train of thought sometimes when I speak and can't think of words.  Not too often but more often than usual.  I don't know if I am just paranoid and that is happening or not.  I was wondering if you had any thoughts on this?  Any help would be great.
title: headache and pain
